author: Adevarul
title: Ground News - London police are on alert. An anti-Semite on a bicycle flies the hats off the heads of Orthodox Jews he meets on the street VIDEO
text:
Summary by Adevarul An unknown individual is wanted by London police after attacking several Jews in the Stamford Hill area of London in a series of anti-Semitic attacks by being filmed throwing their hats at Jews near a synagogue in Hackney. Share menu More
